description:
Monitor your Apache JMeter load test in real time with InfluxDB and Grafana.
Get overall summary, errors details and particular transaction response times.

targets.query:
SELECT sum("maxAT") 
FROM "$measurement_name" 
WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal') 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") 
FROM "$measurement_name" 
WHERE ("transaction" = 'all') 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("countError") 
FROM "$measurement_name" 
WHERE ("transaction" = 'all') 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT 1- (sum("countError") / sum("count")) AS "error_rate"
FROM "$measurement_name" 
WHERE "transaction" = 'all' 
AND "application" =~ /.*/ 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (sum("countError") / sum("count")) AS "fail_rate"
FROM "$measurement_name"
WHERE "transaction" = 'all' 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /.*/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /.*/ )  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum("mean_count") / 10 
FROM (
    SELECT mean("count") AS "mean_count" 
    FROM "$measurement_name" 
    WHERE ("transaction" = 'all') 
    AND $timeFilter 
    GROUP BY time(10s), "application" fill(null)
)
GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("avg") 
FROM "$measurement_name" 
WHERE ("application" =~ /.*/ ) 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "transaction", time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /.*/ )  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /.*/ )  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum("maxAT") 
FROM "$measurement_name" 
WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal') 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum("maxAT") 
FROM "$measurement_name" 
WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /.*/) 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") 
FROM "$measurement_name" 
WHERE ("transaction" = 'all') 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("mean_count") / 10 
FROM (
    SELECT mean("count") AS "mean_count" 
    FROM "$measurement_name" 
    WHERE ("transaction" = 'all') 
    AND $timeFilter 
    GROUP BY time(10s), "application" fill(null)
)
GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE  ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))
SELECT mean("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("count") / 10 FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") / $send_interval AS "Count"
FROM "$measurement_name"
WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/)
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(10s), "responseCode"
fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "responseCode","responseMessage"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement_name" WITH KEY = "application"
list.name: application

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement_name" WITH KEY = "application"

list.name: transaction
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'

title: Apache JMeter Dashboard v6
